Structs/PDFTableCellPosition.html#/s:5TP.abstract: Returns a Boolean value indicating whether two values are equal.

Functions.html#/s:5TPPDF1poiSC7CGPointVA.abstract: Adds two points together, by adding their components.

Enums/PDFPageFormat.html#/s:5TPPDF13PDFP.abstract: B-Series is the geometric mean of the A-series

Enums/PDFPageFormat.html#/s:5TPPDF13PDFP.name: c0
Enums/PDFPageFormat.html#/s:5TPPDF13PDFP.abstract: C-Series is ususally used for envelopes. Definition is written in ISO 269

Enums/PDFPageFormat.html#/s:5TPPDF13PDFP.name: usSize

Classes/PDFSectionColumn.html#/s:5TPPDF1.abstract: Reset text color in given container to default.
